post:
Hi to all of you.

We offer another great XEN HVM Plan under our low cost brand [sugarVPS.com](http://sugarvps.com)

Here is what we offer:

- **XEN HVM** - USA - DALLAS
- **2** Shared CPU Cores
- **1024 MB** of RAM (add **$1.5** for additional 1024 MB)
- **30 GB** Of **HW Raid 10** Storage
- **750 GB @ 1 GBPS** shared port
- **IPv6** Ready
- ONLY **$5.5** Per Month

[ORDER YOURS @ **sugarVPS.com**](http://sugarvps.com) (click on sugar bag)

Linux, Windows (with your licence or 180 days trial), or any other ISO that you provide

We don't allow torrents, public vpn, tor, warez, porn and any other illegal activity.

You can find more about us @ [our web](https://drserver.net). 

Also check our Dedicated Core plans @ [**AbusiveCores**](http://abusivecores.com), where you can run your **CPU at 100% all day long**. Plans are starting from **$6.5 per month**.

EDIT: 
**All AbusiveCores plans are sold out. [Contact us](https://drserver.net/support.php) if you wish to reserve your Slot.**

All orders are processed by hand, so you will wait a little bit for activation.

Here is little about our unique customer approach:
http://lowendtalk.com/discussion/comment/410871/


**Funny but true:**

This time we will listen to our friend @rds100 and we will make **Pocket Lamp Giveaway** to random customer. Also as promised we will give **Casio f91w** to random customer.

Thank you for your time, 

Best wishes from Croatia
